> An application created in elixir to help deploy on servers via SSH

## Referência

- [deployer](https://deployer.org/)

## Install

```sh
wget meulinkdeinstall.sh | bash
```

## Usage

```sh
axis --help
```

## Run tests

```sh
mix test
```

## Author

- [@alyssonsants](https://www.github.com/alyssonsants)
